name: Macro-2
body:
# Welcome to Macro-2 Page.
Macro-2 is the second version of a simple mouse and keyboard recording program. It records keyboard and mouse input and then plays it back in the exact same way that it was recorded.

## Current Features
####Record Mouse input
*(keyboard in the works)* Records the position of the mouse at a frequency of 500hz, resulting in smooth playback.  
####Save/Open Recorded Macros
Macros that have been recorded can be saved to a text file, or previous ones loaded.  
####Hotkeys
Control the macro recording and playback with the use of hot-keys.

## Authors and Contributors
Made by Andy Keech (@pwnedpixel)  
*Donate:* [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/Akeech)
